net.sourceforge.jasa.agent.strategy
Class GDStrategy

java.lang.Object

                  net.sourceforge.jasa.agent.strategy.GDStrategy
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, net.sourceforge.jabm.event.EventListener, net.sourceforge.jabm.strategy.Strategy, net.sourceforge.jabm.util.Parameterizable, net.sourceforge.jabm.util.Prototypeable, net.sourceforge.jabm.util.Resetable, FixedQuantityStrategy, TradingStrategy, MarketEventListener
public class GDStrategy
extends FixedDirectionStrategy
implements java.io.Serializable, net.sourceforge.jabm.util.Prototypeable

An implementation of the Gjerstad Dickhaut strategy. Agents using this strategy calculate the probability of any bid being accepted and bid to maximize expected profit. See

"Price Formation in Double Auctions" S. Gjerstad, J. Dickhaut and R. Palmer

Note that you must configure a report of type HistoricalDataReport in order to use this strategy.

Version:
$Revision$
Author:
Marek Marcinkiewicz
See Also:
HistoricalDataReport, Serialized Form
